survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Subscription-Based Pet Care Boxes
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers of subscription-based pet care boxes to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and understand preferences for future offerings.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to our pet care box service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to simplify data analysis. Consider mobile-friendly dropdown for longer option lists.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to our pet care box service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the products included in your pet care box?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced and includes a neutral option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the products included in your pet care box?

questions.question_text: Which of the following product categories do you find most valuable in your pet care box? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.

script.question_text: Which of the following product categories do you find most valuable in your pet care box? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use the products included in your pet care box?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure product utility.

script.question_text: How often do you use the products included in your pet care box?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for subscribing to our pet care box service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique motivations.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text field for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional OPEN_TEXT)

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for subscribing to our pet care box service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customization options available for your pet care box?

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the customization options available for your pet care box?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our pet care box service to others?

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our pet care box service to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our pet care box service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our pet care box service?

questions.question_text: How frequently would you prefer to receive your pet care box?
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open-text field for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional OPEN_TEXT)

script.question_text: How frequently would you prefer to receive your pet care box?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in add-on services such as veterinary consultations or pet training tips?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe to gauge interest in additional services.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in add-on services such as veterinary consultations or pet training tips?
